preferences.title: New bookmarks
preferences.name: createBookmarksAsUnread
preferences.label: Create bookmarks as unread by default
preferences.description: Sets the default state for the "Mark as unread" option when creating a new bookmark. Setting this option will make all new bookmarks default to unread. This can be overridden when creating each new bookmark.

preferences.title: Search bookmarks
preferences.name: showDescription
preferences.label: Show description
preferences.description: Whether to show a description for each bookmark in search results.

preferences.name: showTags
preferences.label: Show tags
preferences.description: Whether to show a list of tags for each bookmark in search results.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
